in pasal usas pela prashna pathrawala waradi athayi boruwata amathum dun aya gana soyanna si.ayi.di yata bhara kala usas pela prashna pathrawala waradi athayi boruwata amathum dun aya gana soyanna si.ayi.di yata bhara kala amathi bandula gunawardhana kushan subasinha - ajith alahakon aposa usas pela wibhagaye prashna pathrawala waradi athayi asathya prakasha karamin wibhaga departhamenthuwe kshanika ama usas pela prashna pathra agayime niratha guruwarunta seth patha bodhi puja usas pela prashna pathra agayime niratha guruwarunta seth patha bodhi puja mewara aposa (usas pela) wibhagaye prashna pathra agayim karana guru bhawathunta sethpatha bodhi puja pinkamak mema 30 wanida ude 9.00 ta boralla shri gothami wiharayedi pawathwimata wiharadhipathi thelwaththe oona ma prashnayak sakachcha kara wisandimata hakiyawa thibiya di usas pela prashna pathra agayima prathik oona ma prashnayak sakachcha kara wisandimata hakiyawa thibiya di usas pela prashna pathra agayima prathikshepa kirima waradak amal udawaththa oona ma prashnayak sakachcha kara wisandimata hakiyawa thibiya di usas pela prashna pathra agayim prathikshepa karana piris owun ge prashna wa usas pela prashna pathra nawatha samikshanaya hethuwen gatalu athi wi na wibhaga komasarisnilantha madurawala pasugiya adhyayana podu sahathikapathra usas pela wibhagaye uththara pathra nawatha samikshana hethuwen gatalu athi wu bawata kisidu sisuwaku wibhaga departhamenthuwata paminili kara nathaya ාyaka (ja.wi.pe.) saha kurunagala disthrik manthri akila wiraj kariyawasam (e.ja.pa.) yana mahathwarun wisin usas pela prashna pathra sambandhayen mathukala prashnawalata pilithuru washayeni.
